body:
Please file this bug report at https://github.com/flutter/flutter-intellij/issues/new.

---

## What happened

(please describe what you were doing when this exception occurred)

## Version information

Android Studio `4.2.2` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 58.0.1` • Dart plugin `202.8531`

Flutter 2.2.3 • channel stable • https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git
Framework • revision f4abaa0735 (3 weeks ago) • 2021-07-01 12:46:11 -0700
Engine • revision 241c87ad80
Tools • Dart 2.13.4

## Exception

null

comment_data.body:
The original title included this info:
Android Studio in Ubuntu 21.04 Hisrute Hippo

rename.from: I Don't know what error is this, But this is an Error. I'm using Android Studio in Ubuntu 21.04 Hisrute Hippo. Please fix this issue ASAP.

milestone.description: Work triaged but not yet planned for a specific release.
milestone.title: Backlog

title: Error in PerfGutterIconRenderer.updateUI()
